title: kentbull
author: kentbull
content: Who should I talk to in order to get the status of the BitcoinArmory wallet?I have a need to send some Bitcoin from an old version of the BitcoinArmory wallet and I'm getting an error when I try to send so I'm pulling up the code to debug the software and possibly patch it myself if needed.

comments.author: BitMaxz
comments.body: What do you mean talk? Do you mean you want to discuss it or are you talking about logs?If it logs then you can find the logs in armorylogs.txt or if you are looking for the section where to discuss this then bring this to the Armory section here below - https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?board=97.0

comments.author: kentbull
comments.body: Thanks, I was wondering where to go. I'm more looking for where to discuss things like this.

comments.author: RickDeckard
comments.body: Quote from: kentbull on December 02, 2022, 11:59:16 PMThanks, I was wondering where to go. I'm more looking for where to discuss things like this.Well, for starters you can request to move your thread[1] to the dedicated section of the forum[2] where discussion about the Armory wallet happens (the official Armory website[3] in their Support page also takes you to that specific forum). Additionally you can also try to contact the developers over their IRC channel on Freenode: #bitcoin-armory. If you don't have an IRC client installed you can just use a web client[4] to try to talk with someone that may had a problem similar to yours.[1] https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5265053.0[2] https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?board=97.0[3] https://www.bitcoinarmory.com/contact/[4] https://webchat.freenode.net/?channels=bitcoin-armory
